attributes.action: Deport Muslim hate preachers along with their families

rejection.details:
We cannot accept your petition as it seems to be asking for British citizens to be deported. It is not possible for the Government to carry out that action. You can find more information about that here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/identifying-british-citizens-and-others-exempt-from-deportation

The Government already has the power to deport people when the Home Secretary has decided that their removal from the country is 'conducive to the public good'.

A court can also recommend deportation if someone is convicted of a criminal offence with a prison term.
